result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (7th, 8th or 9th) and Operating w/ PAC (7th, 8th or 9th). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (7th, 8th or 9th) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (7th, 8th or 9th) was dismissed by the court.

  • Brandon Kyle Chapman was found guilty of OWI (7th, 8th or 9th), a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).
  • Brandon Kyle Chapman was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/cost to be paid to COCC on a payment plan of $25.00 per month starting 1/15/15.  Failure to pay will be warrant.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.
May not vote or hold public office.  Absolute Sobriety - must be on a sobrietor or device that monitors sobriety constantly.

timeConds.notes: 6 months up front and 6 months banked for use by Probation.  Subject to goodtime.
Must serve 25 hours per year starting in the 2nd year of Probation.

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to COCC on a payment plan of $25.00 per month starting 1/15/15.  Failure to pay will be warrant.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.
May not vote or hold public office.

timeConds.notes: Banked time in Count 1 covers Count 2 as well.

SENTENCING: 
Ct 1-  I/S- 8 yrs-  5 in & 3 out, 5 yrs prob, 6 mos cond'l jail time, 6 mos banked jail time, sub to GT and H after 48 hrs, 86 days sent cred- only if revoked, successful completion of Drug Court, have to be on a sobrietor or device that moniters sobriety constantly, Absolute Sobriety, $290.60 fines/costs. 100 hrs comm serv on felony- starting in year 2- 25 hours in each year. 
Ct 2- sent w/h, place on prob for 1 year- for a total of 6 yrs, banked time covers both counts, 86 days sent credit, cannot possess firearms or body armor, cannot vote or hold public office. $265.60 fines/costs.

Susp of DL for 3 yrs,  AODA and compliance, IID on any vehicles registered in name.  PP of $25/mo to begin on 1-15-15 and on 15th of every month thereafter.
